content: stitch him a crochet hat that will make him think of you every time he wears it designed with a man in mind this option is easy to create in single_crochet in back loop and short-turn row techniques vertical textured lines combine with a neutral color to make this version versatile for any guy but you can give it a bolder look in any shade of red heart super saver the durable yarn is easy-care and will look great wash after wash
